section_1_files_to_modify.enforcement: üö® CRITICAL: Do not touch any other file

section_2_scope_boundary.add_this_text:
‚ö†Ô∏è SCOPE BOUNDARY: You are restricted to ONLY the files listed above. Even if you notice:
- ESLint formatting issues in other files
- Typos or potential bugs elsewhere
- Opportunities to improve related code

You MUST NOT change them. Your task is focused and bounded.
section_2_scope_boundary.reasoning: Makes boundary explicit, normalizes seeing issues you won't fix

section_3_validation_gate.add_this_text:
VALIDATION (before commit): Run 'git diff --name-only' and verify output ONLY contains:
- frontend/src/services/api.ts
- frontend/src/components/forms/UserProfileForm.tsx

If ANY other files appear ‚Üí DO NOT COMMIT. Report scope violation instead.
section_3_validation_gate.reasoning: Forces self-validation before any changes persist

section_4_failure_condition.add_this_text:
IF you see opportunity to improve/fix files outside [FILES_TO_MODIFY]:
STOP immediately. Do NOT make changes. Instead:
1. Document the opportunity
2. Report it as '[OUT_OF_SCOPE] Opportunity found in [filename]: [description]'
3. Let Claude decide if it should be addressed
section_4_failure_condition.reasoning: Channels improvement impulse into reporting instead of unauthorized changes
